short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for randomly picking a restaurant in UberEats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for randomly picking a restaurant in UberEats.

Instructions:
1.- Navigate to Ubereats.com
2.- Look for the DinnerRoulette button at the bottom right corner
3.- Roll for a random category
4.- Roll for a random restaurant

Blacklist restaurants and categories to prevent the extension from suggesting them to you. In order to manage your blacklisted restaurant and categories, open up the settings menu by clicking the extension button at the top right of your browser.
